nodes.text: A friendly-fire incident occurred in the Nuvar system after the Battle of Var-Shaa in 4 ABY, during the Galactic Civil War, in which the Galactic Empire's Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier Exigent was destroyed by missiles unintentionally fired from a nearby Imperial defense station. The station had been recently captured from the New Republic, but its targeting system profiles hadn't been cleared and was therefore still programmed to fire on Imperial ships.
